title: Border, 1795–1805
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Horizontal rectangle. Border paper with repeating design of medallions, enclosed by simple leaf forms, containing floral spray, set against vertical stripes. Across upper edge, stripes of orange and white; across lower edge, white stripe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1795–1805.
1795–1805. Block-printed, handmade paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1928-2-55.
